Name: Shu amulet
Description: The god Shu together with Tefnut formed the first couple of the Ennead of Heliopolis. He is regarded as the god of the space between heaven and earth but also as the incarnation of the cool north wind. In his latter capacity he seems to have been an important deity for the deceased. The wish for refreshment is encountered in almost every tomb.Shu amulets show the god kneeling with his arms raised. On his head there is the sun disc.
